answer:
(a) identification of Object in the Diagram:-Cruet set.

(b) Places where the Object could be Placed 1 during Food Service: -On the dining table-On a tray.

(C) Food Items that could be Stored in the Object. -Salt. -Pepper/Cayenne Pepper/paprika/white pepper/black pepper. -Mustard. -Oil. -Vinegar .

(d) Use of the object in the Diagram: it is used by the guest or customer at the table to add condiments/salt/pepper /mustard/oil/vinegar to their meals.

(e) Materials for Making the Object in the Diagram :-Glass -Wood-Plastic -stainless steel ceramics-Rubber -Bamboo -Aluminum -Metal.
